Verses: 1 eremiyaa Indha Vaarththaigalaith Theerkkadharisanamaaga Sollugiradhai Aasaariyan Immerudaiya Kumaaranum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththup Pradhaana Visaaranaik Karththanumaagiya Paskoor Kettapodhu,
2 eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaip Paskoor Adiththu, Avanaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Benyameen Koththiraththaarai Serndha Melvaasalil Irukkum Kaavalaraiyile Pottaan.
3 marunaalile Paskoor Eremiyaavaik Kaavalaraiyilirundhu Veliye Pogavittaan; Appozhudhu Eremiyaa Avanai Nokki: Karththar Unnaip Paskoor Endru Azhaikkaamal, Maagormeesaabeep Endru Azhaikkiraar.

4 melum Karththar: Idho, Naan Unnaiyum Un Ellaa Snegidharaiyum Pattayaththukku Oppukkodukkiren; Un Kangal Kaana Ivargal Saththurukkalin Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Yoodhaa Anaiththaiyum Naan Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen; Avan Avargalai Siraipidiththu, Silarai Baabilonukkuk Kondupoi, Silaraip Pattayaththaal Vettippoduvaan.

5 indha Nagaraththin Ellaappalaththaiyum, Adhin Ellaa Sambaththaiyum Adhin Arumaiyaana Ellaap Porulgalaiyum, Yoodhaa Raajaakkalin Ellaap Pokkishangalaiyum, Naan Avargal Saththurukkal Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen; Avargal Avargalaik Kollaiyittu, Baabilonukkuk Kondupovaargal.

6 paskoore, Neeyum Un Veettil Vaasamaayirukkira Yaavarum Siraippattuppoveergal; Neeyum Un Kallaththeerkkadharisanaththukku Sevikoduththa Un Snegidhar Yaavarum Baabilonukkup Poi, Ange Mariththu, Ange Adakkampannappaduveergal Endru Sollugiraar Endraan.
7 karththaave, Ennai Inangappannineer, Naan Inanginen; Neer Ennilum Balaththavaraayirundhu, Ennai Merkondeer; Naaldhorum Nagaippukku Idamaanen; Ellaarum Ennaip Parigaasampannugiraargal.
8 naan Pesinadhu Mudharkondu Kadharugiren; Kodumaiyendrum Paazhkkadippendrum Saththamittuk Koorugiren, Naan Koorina Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Naaldhorum Enakku Nindhaiyum, Parigaasamumaayitru.

9 aadhalaal Naan Avaraip Prasthaabampannaamalum Inik Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Pesaamalum Iruppen Endren; Aanaalum Avarudaiya Vaarththai En Elumbugalil Adaipattu Erigira Akkiniyaippol En Irudhayaththil Irundhadhu; Adhai Sagiththu Ilaiththupponen; Enakkup Porukkak Koodaamarpoyitru.

10 anegar Sollum Avadhooraik Ketten, Bayanchoozhndhirundhadhu; Ariviyungal, Appozhudhu Naangal Adhai Arivippom Engiraargal; Ennode Samaadhaanamaayirundha Anaivarum Naan Thavarivizhumpadik Kaaththirundhu Oruvelai Inanguvaan, Appozhudhu Avanai Merkondu Avanil Kurodhan Theerththukkolvom Engiraargal.

11 karththaro Bayangaramaana Paraakkiramasaaliyaai Ennodu Irukkiraar, Aagaiyaal Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargal Merkollaamal Idaruvaargal; Thangal Kaariyam Vaaikkaadhapadiyaal Migavum Vetkappaduvaargal; Marakkappadaadha Niththiya Lachchai Avargalukku Undaagum.

12 aanaalum Needhimaanai Sodhiththarindhu, Ullindhiriyangalaiyum Irudhayaththaiyum Paarkkira Senaigalin Karththaave, Neer Avargalukku Needhiyai Sarikkattugiradhaik Kaanbenaaga; En Kaariyaththai Ummidaththil Saattivitten.
13 karththaraip Paadungal Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Eliyavanudaiya Aaththumaavaip Pollaadhavargalin Kaikkuth Thappuvikkiraar.
14 naan Pirandhanaal Sabikkappaduvadhaaga; En Thaayaar Ennaip Petra Naal Aaseervadhikkappadaadhiruppadhaaga.
15 umakku Oru Aanpillai Pirandhadhendru En Thagappanukku Narcheydhiyaaga Ariviththu Avanai Migavum Sandhoshappaduththina Manushan Sabikkappadakkadavan.
16 andha Manushan, Karththar Manammaaraamal Kavizhththuppotta Pattanangalaippolirundhu, Kaalame Alarudhalaiyum Maththiyaana Velaiyile Kookkuralaiyum Ketkakkadavan.
17 en Thaayaar Enakkup Predhakkuzhiyum, Naan Endraikkum Prasaviyaadha Soolumaai Irukkaththakkadhaagak Karppaththile Naan Kolaiseyyappadaamarponadhenna?
18 naan Varuththaththaiyum Sanjalaththaiyum Kandu, En Naatkal Vetkamaaik Kazhiyumpadikku Naan Karppaththilirundhu Velippattadhenna?
